name: Carious Weltling II
summary: The main objective of control a weltling to make it stay alive in a boiling desert by collecting maggots and taking out enemies. The background information about weltlings is presented as a series of drawn stills and the graphics have received a large overhaul. There are new enemies, new attack patterns and a familiar selection of power-ups.
